About.paragraph: Twende is Africaâ€™s top travel platform, offering affordable carpooling to numerous destinations and routes across East Africa.

Features.title: Real-Time Community Travel Alerts
Features.text: Users can get real-time travel updates and security alerts from fellow commuters.

Features.title: AI-Powered Trip Planning
Features.text: Suggests optimal routes, departure times, and ride options .

Features.title: Group Ride Coordination & Cost Sharing
Features.text: Users traveling to the same location can form groups to share rides.

Features.title: Multi-Modal Trip Integration
Features.text: Encourages smarter urban mobility, especially in Kenyan towns..
